alert.note: Alert for Lapeer (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 5:58PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lapeer County through 700 PM EDT... At 558 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lapeer, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lum around 620 PM EDT. Imlay City around 625 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Goodland Township, Kings Mill, Attica, Elba and Burnside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
